name: MinoTour
description:
Local multiplayer for 3 people or more.

Become one of the Minotaur's ritually sacrificed young adventurers and try to escape from Minotaur's maze

...or, become Minotaur himself and catch his unruly offering before he escapes!

There's one catch tough - the adventurer cannot see a thing (it's very very dark).

There's second one as well - you also need to get Magical Artifact™ first, which then enables you to pass through the exit.

Players:
1. The Sacrificed Adventurer uses dance pad (or gamepad or keyboard) to blindly navigate through the maze.
2. Minotaur uses gamepad or keyboard (or second dance pad) to cross the adventurer's way.
3-∞. Everyone else watching the screen tries to help blind adventurer to get to the exit.

Credits:
Konrad Burandt
Damian Komorowski
Sebastian Krzyszkowiak
Mateusz Sójka

Made at Global Game Jam 2016 in Poznań
